original_contract.title: Cinderella
original_contract.logline: A young girl overcomes her abusive stepfamily with the help of a magical benefactor to win the heart of a prince.

characters.name: Cinderella
characters.motivation: Attend the royal ball and find true love

characters.name: The Stepmother
characters.motivation: Prevent Cinderella from attending the ball

plot_beats.description: An invitation to a grand event sparks desire in the protagonist
The protagonist is aided by a powerful, magical benefactor
The protagonist must escape a situation before a deadline
The protagonist's true identity is revealed, leading to a joyful reunion

context_map.new_logline: A young student from a humble background overcomes her abusive academic pressures with the help of a mentor to secure admission into the prestigious Indian Institute of Technology.

characters.description: A kind and diligent student from a low-income family, facing academic pressures and neglect from her stepfamily.
A charming and experienced professor who guides Riya in her IIT preparation and becomes her love interest.

characters.role_in_new_world: Riya's Step-mother and Owner of a Coaching Institute
characters.description: A cruel and manipulative woman who prioritizes her own coaching institute's interests over Riya's well-being and academic success.

setting.rules: The Indian education system's competitive environment, with a focus on IIT JEE exams and the significance of coaching institutes.

plot_outline: Riya discovers the opportunity to take the IIT JEE exam and becomes determined to secure admission, despite her step-mother's disapproval.
Riya meets Professor Kumar, who agrees to mentor her and helps her prepare for the exams, boosting her confidence and skills.
As the exam date approaches, Riya faces increased pressure from her step-mother and the competition, forcing her to balance her preparation with her personal life.

Riya takes the IIT JEE exam and, with Professor Kumar's support, achieves a remarkable score, securing her admission into IIT and reuniting with Professor Kumar, who reveals his romantic interest in her.
